name: Ambition of the Slimes
description: A new spin on strategy RPG gaming! Slimes, the weakest of RPG characters, can take over an enemy unit and fight! This twist on the genre allows Slimes of various types to take over and control a broad range of powerful human units - it's a wonderful underdog story!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Pentium(R) Dual-Core CPU E6500 @ 2.93GHz (2 CPUs) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4670 or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
